msg.msgText: A read operation on a StreamMessage object failed because there were bytes remaining to be read after a previous call to readBytes().

msgExplanation.p: Read methods on a StreamMessage object that are invoked after a previous call to readBytes() can succeed only after readBytes() finished reading data. This is indicated when readBytes() returns -1.

msgUserResponse.p: Ensure that readBytes() returns -1 before attempting to read subsequent data from a StreamMessage.
